attributes.action: confirm that the use of electronic cigarettes, pipes and personal vaporisers is allowed in public places.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As electronic cigarettes and pipes do not involve the combustion of tobacco  or present a risk of passive smoking to non-smokers this petition seeks confirmation that the use of such devices in public places is acceptable.

rejection.details: We suggest you check with the Department of Health for further clarification: www.dh.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
